content: --धर (धूर्धर, also धुरंधर) {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} bearing the yoke. {2} fit to be harnessed. {3} laden with good qualities or important duties. {4} chief, head, foremost, pre-eminent; कुलधुरंधरो भव <ls>V. 5.</ls> (--रः {1} a beast of burden. {2} a man of business. {3} a chief, head, leader. {4} an epithet of Śiva.
